text: Giovanna Troldi (born 31 October 1968) is a road cyclist from Italy. She won the Italian National Time Trial Championships in 2002, 2003 and 2004 and represented her nation at the 2003 UCI Road World Championships. ==References== ==External links== * profile at Procyclingstats.com Category:1968 births Category:Italian female cyclists Category:Living people Category:People from Venice
title: Giovanna Troldi
